entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, St. Leonard

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16.
